channel.title: The proverbial fork.
channel.description: Recent content on The proverbial fork.

item.title: Day 0
item.description: I am headed to self-destruction. My inevitable expiration approaches and I should ask: is there another path? Today, I intend to find out.
item.content:
I am headed to self-destruction. My inevitable expiration approaches and I should ask: is there another path?

Today, I intend to find out.
